sentences.en: " They were seditious rebellious, traitorous T types. "
sentences.cn: 他们是具有煽动性、反抗性 、 谋反性的T型性格者. ”

sentences.en: He fell under suspicion for distributing seditious pamphlets.
sentences.cn: 他因分发反政府传单而受到怀疑。

words.tran_cn: 暴动；煽动性的言论或行为；妨害治安
煽动性的；扰乱治安的；参与煽动的

trans.tran_en: A seditious act, speech, or piece of writing encourages people to fight against or oppose the government
